title: Arcade Mission not working
body: Heya, the mission "Lvl 2- Make them suffer" is a mission ive  been trying to complete for the past couple days. I thought that I just wasn't meeting the goal for it for awhile but I just got done with a nasus game and I had 300 cs and we won, but the progress did not progress at all. Please help!

replies.body: Looks like that mission was finally able to update. I'm seeing the first portion that needs 600 minions killed already completed, and now you just need to win 2 more SR games with 100 minions kills in each match.
